Title: Fortress 2
Writer: Steven Feinberg (characters), Troy Neighbors (characters), Steven Feinberg (story), Troy Neighbors (story), John Flock (screenplay), Peter Doyle (screenplay)
Actors: Christopher Lambert, Aidan Ostrogovich, David Roberson, Liz May Brice
Plot: 7 years after the original Fortress movie, Brennick along with the rebels are captured and sent to a new, more sophisticated fortress prison, in outer space.
